about_the_game:
Teacher Seduction is a kinetic visual novel with dating sim elements about a guy who studies computer science at university.

He likes math and has a crush on his math teacher Ms.Parker, but he can't spend any time with her because of his part-time job, which makes it impossible to have any activities other than classes.

However, when our hero finds out that Jill has recently started a relationship with a literature teacher from his university who is also a total jerk, he decides to quit his job and try to enter a math competition to win her heart while they spend time preparing for it.

Will he succeed and overcome all the problems, or has he risked everything for nothing and made his relationship with Ms.Parker worse? Let's find out!

This game includes:
• Dramatic story with romance and comedy elements.
• HD fully original artworks.
• ≈ 1 hour of content.
• Relaxing atmosphere.
• Soundtrack by Antti Luode.

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains veiled nudity, sexual themes and dialogue.

name: Teacher Seduction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Math is such a boring thing... Unless you have a hot teacher! In this case, even her angry boyfriend might not be a big problem.
